original_text: When you build an altar to offer sacrifices to the Lord your God, do not put any Asherah pole there. When you build an altar to offer sacrifices to the Lord your God, do not put any Asherah pole there.
korean_text: 네 하나님 여호와를 위하여 쌓은 제단 곁에 어떤 나무로든지 아세라 상을 세우지 말며

sentences.original_text: to offer sacrifices to the Lord your God
sentences.korean_translation: 당신의 하나님 여호와께 제사를 드리기 위해

sentences.original_text: do not put any Asherah pole there
to offer sacrifices to the Lord your God
sentences.korean_translation: 당신의 하나님 여호와께 제사를 드리기 위해

sentences.original_text: do not put any Asherah pole there
